src:
2 Sinyal Unai Emery, Granit Xhaka Absen Lawan Wolves?
01 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Granit Xhaka mungkin tidak akan bermain ketika Arsenal menjamu Wolverhampton, Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB besok. Setelah insiden konfrontasi dengan fans The Gunners akhir pekan lalu, Xhaka mungkin harus beristirahat sejenak.
Xhaka membuat kesalahan fatal ketika meluapkan emosinya pada laga imbang 2-2 kontra Crystal Palace. Saat itu Xhaka ditarik keluar di babak kedua, dia tampak kesal saat meninggalkan lapangan, bahkan mengumpat.
Kemudian, Xhaka tidak masuk dalam skuad ketika Arsenal dikalahkan Liverpool di ajang Carabao Cup tengah pekan lalu. Perubahan ini melahirkan pertanyaan: apakah Xhaka bakal bermain saat melawan Wolves nanti?

Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
2 Unai Emery Signals, Xhaka Granite Absent Against Wolves?
Nov 01 2019, 11:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Granit Xhaka will probably not play when Arsenal entertain Wolverhampton on Saturday (11/02/2019) night WIB tomorrow. After a confrontation with the Gunners fans last weekend, Xhaka might have to take a break.
Xhaka made a fatal mistake when he ventured in a 2-2 draw against Crystal Palace. When Xhaka was pulled out in the second round, he looked upset when he left the field, even cursing.
Then, Xhaka was not in the squad when Arsenal were beaten by Liverpool in the Carabao Cup midweek. This change begs the question: will Xhaka play against Wolves later?

Read below, Bolaneters!
